name: Flags_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithAllFlagsOff
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the Flags class when all flags are off.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithAllFlagsOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the Flags class when all flags are on.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithMixedFlags
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the Flags class with mixed flags.
